notes.directoryIndex: Can be set globally in main config or per virtual host. Virtual host setting overrides global. Default order: index.html, index.htm, index.php
notes.proxyType: Can be 'http' for HTTP reverse proxy or 'fcgi' for FastCGI proxy. Default is 'http'
notes.proxyPath: Optional. If set, only requests matching this path prefix will be proxied. Other requests will be served as static files
notes.cgiPath: Path prefix where CGI scripts are located (e.g., '/cgi-bin'). Scripts in this path will be executed
notes.proxyUnixSocket: Unix socket path for proxy connections (e.g., '/var/run/app.sock')
notes.user: System user to run processes as (for CGI execution)
notes.group: System group to run processes as (for CGI execution)
